entry.title: Installing Python and related library in the Linux environnment
entry.id: http://localhost:4000/Installing Python and related library in the Linux environnment
entry.content:
1. Installing Python

Here one could find the Python version library https://www.python.org/ftp/python/. As an example, I chose the version 2.7.5, then command by â€“prefix to define the installation path:

wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.7.5/Python-2.7.5.tgz tar -xzf Python-2.7.5.tgz cd Python-2.7.5 mkdir -p /home/liudiwei/software/python27 ./configure --prefix="/home/liudiwei/software/python27" make make install

entry.title: Solving urlopen and SSL CERTIFICATE_VERIFY_FAILED Error
entry.id: http://localhost:4000/Solving urlopen and SSL CERTIFICATE_VERIFY_FAILED Error
entry.content:
1. A SSL Certificate Verify Error

If you are the first time to create a crawler which on the way to read contents of some websites, the Python IDLE probably could alert an error, named SSL: CERTIFICATE_VERIFY_FAILED, look like this:

from urllib.request

entry.title: Using iOS CoreMotion to call gyroscope and accelerometer
entry.id: http://localhost:4000/Using iOS CoreMotion to call gyroscope and accelerometer
entry.content:
1. CoreMotion Framework

Core Motion reports motion- and environment-related data from the onboard hardware of iOS devices, including from the accelerometers and gyroscopes, and from the pedometer, magnetometer, and barometer. You use this framework to access hardware-generated data so that you can use it in your app. For example,...
